rationale: AAPL is set to report earnings next week, historically showing a run-up in stock price leading to the event. With increasing call volume and positive sentiment, this trade aims to capture the pre-earnings momentum.

TSLA has broken out of a key resistance level with strong volume and positive price action. The bullish trend is supported by increasing call flow and a potential short squeeze, making this a high-reward setup.

AMZN is facing regulatory scrutiny with a pending antitrust decision looming. This uncertainty has led to increased put activity and a bearish sentiment. The trade aims to capitalize on the downside potential ahead of the event.
